text: Hey, what's up creators? My name is Luke

what we're going to do is with this
we're just going to write some simple
code. This event for oncllicked is just
going to fire some blueprint when the

we're going to do is we're going to drag
out from the execution pin and we are
going to search for the function quit
game.
What that's going to do is simply take

And the console command that we're going

and 0.5.
And let's just click on this and see if
it's enough.
